app_descript:
PulsePoint Respond

Brief:

PulsePoint Respond is an emergency alert app designed to keep you informed about local threats such as wildland fires, flooding, and utility emergencies. Its features are aimed at giving community members an early warning to enhance their preparedness for various situations. With the ability to monitor live dispatch radio traffic, users can stay updated with real-time information about incidents in their area.
